sentences.english: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.
sentences.chinese: 紅瑪瑙與別樣的寶石，可以鑲嵌在以弗得和胸牌上。

sentences.english: and onyx stones and other gems to be mounted on the ephod and breastpiece.
sentences.chinese: 紅瑪瑙與別樣的寶石，可以鑲嵌在以弗得和胸牌上。

sentences.english: It cannot be valued with the gold of Ophir, with the precious onyx, or the sapphire.
sentences.chinese: 俄斐金，和貴重的紅瑪瑙，並藍寶石，不足與較量。

sentences.english: in the fourth row a chrysolite, an onyx and a jasper.
sentences.chinese: 第四行是水蒼玉，紅瑪瑙，碧玉。

sentences.english: And thou shalt take two onyx stones, and shalt grave on them the names of the children of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 再取兩塊紅瑪瑙石，將以色列的兒子的名字刻在上面。

sentences.english: Disciple Jing Xing offered me a red agate seal stone.
sentences.chinese: 弟子敬行送我一方紅瑪瑙印石。

sentences.english: Onyx stones, and precious stones, for the adorning of the ephod and the rational.
sentences.chinese: 紅瑪瑙石和爲鑲在厄弗得和胸牌上的寶石。

sentences.english: And onyx stones， and stones to be set for the ephod， and for the breastplate.
sentences.chinese: 紅瑪瑙與別樣的寶石，可以鑲嵌在以弗得和胸牌上。

definition: red coral/precious coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)

pinyin: Shi1 hua2 luo4 shi4 qi2 shui3 jing1

definition: banner/standard/variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
